dict.acceptation: 葡萄酒；果酒；紫红色，深红色；

sent.orig: Experimental results for both Iris data and Wine data verify the validity of our method.
sent.trans: Iris数据，Wine数据的实验结果都验证了新方法的可行性。

sent.orig: Note that the same distinction arises with the treatment of the Wine class.
sent.trans: 注意：对于Wine类也同样有着上述问题。

sent.orig: Special wine includes low alcohol wine, fruit wine and health care wine etc.
sent.trans: 特种黄酒包含低醇黄酒、果味黄酒和功能性保健黄酒等。

sent.orig: Wine and rice wine, shochu, beer, rice wine and so on.
sent.trans: 酒有黄酒、烧酒、啤酒、米酒等。

sent.orig: Bar Accessory, Gift Sets, Wine Rack, Wine Cooler Wine Set, Kitchen Ware Tableware and Cutlery.
sent.trans: 采购产品酒吧配件，礼品套装，酒机架，葡萄酒冷却器，葡萄酒一套，厨房用品。
